metadata.title: Strictly Dancing MVP - Complete 5-Phase Implementation
metadata.description: Full implementation of the Dance Partner marketplace platform including backend foundation, host profiles, booking system, real-time features, and reviews following TDD methodology.
metadata.author: claude-code

tasks.title: Initialize Backend FastAPI Project
tasks.description: Set up Python backend with FastAPI, UV for dependencies, pyproject.toml, and basic application structure.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: pyproject.toml exists with FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Pydantic dependencies
backend/app/main.py exists with FastAPI app factory
Health endpoint GET /health returns 200 with JSON response
Unit test for health endpoint exists and passes

tasks.title: Configure Backend Core Settings
tasks.description: Create core configuration module with environment variable loading, CORS middleware, and logging setup.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: backend/app/core/config.py exists with Settings class using pydantic-settings
CORS middleware configured for development (localhost origins)
Logging configured with structlog JSON output
Unit test for config loading from environment

tasks.title: Configure Database Connection
tasks.description: Set up SQLAlchemy 2.0 async connection with asyncpg to AWS RDS PostgreSQL.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: backend/app/core/database.py exists with async engine and session factory
get_db dependency for FastAPI routes exists

tasks.title: Initialize Alembic Migrations
tasks.description: Set up Alembic with async support and create initial migration for extensions.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Initial migration creates uuid-ossp and postgis extensions

tasks.title: Create User Database Model
tasks.description: Implement User SQLAlchemy model with all required fields and create migration.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: User has fields: id (UUID), email, password_hash, first_name, last_name, user_type, email_verified, is_active, created_at, updated_at
Alembic migration for users table exists

tasks.title: Create User Pydantic Schemas
tasks.description: Define Pydantic schemas for user request/response validation.

tasks.title: Implement User Repository Layer
tasks.description: Create UserRepository with async CRUD operations following repository pattern.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: UserRepository has create(), get_by_id(), get_by_email(), update(), soft_delete() methods

tasks.title: Implement Password Hashing Service
tasks.description: Create secure Argon2id password hashing service.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: hash_password() uses argon2-cffi with secure parameters

tasks.title: Implement JWT Token Service
tasks.description: Create JWT service for access/refresh tokens using RS256.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Token payload includes sub (user_id), exp, iat, jti

tasks.title: Create Authentication Pydantic Schemas
tasks.description: Define all request/response models for auth endpoints.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: RegisterRequest, LoginRequest, TokenResponse, RefreshRequest schemas defined

tasks.title: Implement User Registration Endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/auth/register with validation.

tasks.title: Implement Login Endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/auth/login returning JWT tokens.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Verifies credentials with same error for email/password mismatch
Returns TokenResponse with access_token and refresh_token

tasks.title: Implement Token Refresh Endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/auth/refresh for obtaining new access tokens.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Validates refresh token signature and expiration

tasks.title: Implement Authentication Middleware
tasks.description: Create FastAPI dependency for JWT auth extracting current user.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Extracts Bearer token from Authorization header
Validates token and loads user from database

tasks.title: Implement Logout Endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/auth/logout.

tasks.title: Implement Get Current User Endpoint
tasks.description: Create GET /api/v1/auth/me returning authenticated user profile.

tasks.title: Initialize PWA Frontend Project
tasks.description: Set up React + Vite + TypeScript frontend with TanStack Router.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: frontend/package.json exists with React, Vite, TanStack Router dependencies
TypeScript strict mode enabled in tsconfig.json
bun run dev starts development server on port 5175

tasks.title: Configure Frontend API Client
tasks.description: Set up OpenAPI client with TanStack Query for type-safe API calls.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: frontend/src/lib/api/$api.ts exists with TanStack Query hooks
API base URL configurable via environment variable

tasks.title: Create Frontend Auth Context
tasks.description: Implement authentication context with login/logout/register functions.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: AuthContext provides user, isAuthenticated, login, logout, register
Token storage in localStorage with refresh logic
Auto-refresh on page load if token exists

tasks.title: Implement Frontend Login Page
tasks.description: Create login page with form validation and API integration.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Loading state and error messages displayed

tasks.title: Implement Frontend Register Page
tasks.description: Create registration page with form validation.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Fields: email, password, confirm password, first name, last name

tasks.title: Create Homepage Route
tasks.description: Implement basic homepage with navigation structure.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Navigation includes links to Login, Register

tasks.title: Create Dance Styles Model and Seed Data
tasks.description: Implement DanceStyle model and seed initial styles.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: DanceStyle has: id, name, slug, category, description
Categories: Latin, Ballroom, Swing, Social, Other

tasks.title: Create Host Profile Model
tasks.description: Implement HostProfile with PostGIS location.

tasks.title: Create Host Dance Styles Junction
tasks.description: Implement many-to-many with skill levels.

tasks.title: Implement Host Profile Repository
tasks.description: Create repository with CRUD and geospatial queries.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: search() with filters: styles, rating, price

tasks.title: Create Host Profile Schemas
tasks.description: Define Pydantic schemas for host operations.

tasks.title: Implement Become Host Endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/users/me/become-host.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Creates HostProfile linked to current user

tasks.title: Implement Host Profile CRUD Endpoints
tasks.description: Create endpoints for host profile management.

tasks.title: Implement Host Search Endpoint
tasks.description: Create GET /api/v1/hosts with filtering and geospatial search.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Query params: lat, lng, radius_km, styles[], min_rating, max_price

tasks.title: Implement Get Host Profile Endpoint
tasks.description: Create GET /api/v1/hosts/{id} for public profile view.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Returns full profile with dance styles, rating

tasks.title: Frontend Host Discovery Page
tasks.description: Create host discovery page with search and filters.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Host cards with photo, name, rating, price

tasks.title: Frontend Host Profile Page
tasks.description: Create individual host profile view page.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Displays host photo, bio, rating, dance styles
Book Now button (links to booking flow)

tasks.title: Create Booking Model
tasks.description: Implement Booking with all fields and relationships.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: FKs to User (client, host), HostProfile, DanceStyle
Status enum: pending, confirmed, in_progress, completed, cancelled, disputed
Amount fields in cents, PostGIS location

tasks.title: Create Host Availability Model
tasks.description: Implement availability schedule storage.

tasks.title: Implement Availability Repository
tasks.description: Create schedule management methods.

tasks.title: Implement Booking Repository
tasks.description: Create booking CRUD and query methods.

tasks.title: Create Booking Schemas
tasks.description: Define request/response schemas for bookings.

tasks.title: Integrate Stripe Connect
tasks.description: Implement Stripe Connect Express for host onboarding.

tasks.title: Implement Booking Creation with Payment Hold
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/bookings with Stripe authorization.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Validates host availability and time slot free

tasks.title: Implement Booking Confirmation
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/bookings/{id}/confirm for host acceptance.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Only host can confirm their bookings

tasks.title: Implement Booking Cancellation
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/bookings/{id}/cancel with refund.

tasks.title: Implement Session Completion with Capture
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/bookings/{id}/complete with payment.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Creates Transfer to host's connected account

tasks.title: Implement Booking List Endpoint
tasks.description: Create GET /api/v1/bookings with filters.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Returns user's bookings (as client or host)

tasks.title: Implement Availability Endpoints
tasks.description: Create host availability management endpoints.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Returns available slots for date range

tasks.title: Frontend Booking Flow Page
tasks.description: Create booking flow with date/time selection.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Time slot selection and duration picker

tasks.title: Frontend Bookings List Page
tasks.description: Create bookings management page.

tasks.title: Create Message and Conversation Models
tasks.description: Implement messaging database models.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Message: conversation_id, sender_id, content, type, read_at

tasks.title: Implement Messaging Repository
tasks.description: Create conversation and message operations.

tasks.title: Create Messaging Schemas
tasks.description: Define schemas for messaging endpoints.

tasks.title: Implement Messaging Endpoints
tasks.description: Create HTTP endpoints for messaging.

tasks.title: Implement WebSocket Chat Backend
tasks.description: Create FastAPI WebSocket for real-time chat.

tasks.title: Frontend Chat Page
tasks.description: Create real-time chat interface.

tasks.title: Frontend Conversations List Page
tasks.description: Create inbox showing all conversations.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Conversations sorted by last message time

tasks.title: Create Review Model
tasks.description: Implement Review for post-session ratings.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Fields: booking_id (unique), reviewer_id, reviewee_id, rating (1-5), comment
Trigger updates host rating_average on insert

tasks.title: Implement Review Repository
tasks.description: Create review operations.

tasks.title: Implement Review Endpoints
tasks.description: Create HTTP endpoints for reviews.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Only completed bookings can be reviewed

tasks.title: Frontend Review Form
tasks.description: Create post-session review interface.

tasks.title: Frontend Reviews Display
tasks.description: Create reusable review list component.

tasks.title: Implement Host Dashboard
tasks.description: Create host dashboard with earnings and stats.

tasks.title: Implement Settings Page
tasks.description: Create user settings and preferences page.

tasks.title: Implement Error Handling
tasks.description: Add comprehensive error handling throughout app.

tasks.title: Backend E2E Test Suite
tasks.description: Create comprehensive API integration tests.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize database queries and API responses.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Database indexes on frequently queried columns

tasks.title: Frontend Host Profile Edit Page
tasks.description: Create profile management for hosts to edit their information.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Manage dance styles with skill levels

tasks.title: Implement Session Start Endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/v1/bookings/{id}/start to begin a session.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Validates confirmed status and within 30min of start time

tasks.title: Frontend Booking Detail Page
tasks.description: Create detailed booking view with actions.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Full booking details with map showing location
Message button and Add to Calendar

tasks.title: Frontend Availability Management Page
tasks.description: Create host availability editor.

tasks.title: Configure Push Notifications Backend
tasks.description: Set up push notification infrastructure with Expo.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Store Expo push tokens per device

tasks.title: Implement Push Notification Triggers
tasks.description: Add push notifications to key events.

tasks.title: Implement WebSocket Location Backend
tasks.description: Create real-time location tracking during sessions.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Authenticates connection and validates session in_progress
Broadcasts location updates via Redis Pub/Sub
Stores location history in booking record

tasks.title: Frontend Location Tracking
tasks.description: Implement location sharing during active sessions.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Send location every 30 seconds during session

tasks.title: Frontend Active Session Screen
tasks.description: Create active session view with location and controls.

tasks.title: Implement Host Verification Backend
tasks.description: Create host identity and background verification system.

tasks.title: Initialize React Native Expo Mobile Project
tasks.description: Set up React Native mobile app with Expo for iOS/Android.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: apps/mobile/package.json exists with Expo, React Native dependencies
Expo Router configured for file-based routing
bun run start launches Expo dev server

tasks.title: Set Up Mobile State Management
tasks.description: Configure Zustand for global state and React Query for server state.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: apps/mobile/stores/auth.ts exists with Zustand auth store

tasks.title: Create Mobile API Client Service
tasks.description: Set up typed API client for mobile app.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Auto-injects auth token from secure store

tasks.title: Implement Mobile Login Screen
tasks.description: Create login screen for mobile app.

tasks.title: Implement Mobile Registration Screen
tasks.description: Create registration screen for mobile app.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Fields: email, password, confirm, names, user type

tasks.title: Implement Mobile Protected Navigation
tasks.description: Set up navigation guards for authenticated screens.

tasks.title: Mobile Host Discovery Screen
tasks.description: Create main discovery with search, filters, map.

tasks.title: Mobile Host Profile Screen
tasks.description: Create host profile view for mobile.

tasks.title: Mobile Booking Flow Screen
tasks.description: Create booking flow for mobile app.

tasks.title: Mobile Bookings List Screen
tasks.description: Create bookings management for mobile.

tasks.title: Mobile Chat Screen
tasks.description: Create real-time chat for mobile.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Message list with keyboard avoiding view

tasks.title: Mobile Messages List Screen
tasks.description: Create inbox for mobile app.

tasks.title: Configure Unit Test Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive unit testing with coverage requirements.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Backend pytest coverage configured with 80% minimum
CI pipeline fails if coverage below threshold

tasks.title: Configure Local Development Testing
tasks.description: Set up local testing for PWA, iOS Simulator, and Android Emulator.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: PWA dev server with hot reload on localhost:5175
iOS Simulator testing documented and working
Android Emulator testing documented and working
Expo Go testing on physical devices
README with local dev setup instructions

tasks.title: Initialize Monorepo Structure
tasks.description: Create complete project directory structure with proper workspace configuration.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Bun workspace links frontend and apps/mobile
Shared TypeScript config extends from root
ESLint and Prettier configurations consistent across packages

tasks.title: Configure Background Job Processing
tasks.description: Set up Celery with Redis for background tasks like emails and notifications.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: backend/app/workers/celery.py exists with Celery app configuration
Redis connection configured for Celery broker
Worker starts with: celery -A app.workers.celery worker

tasks.title: Configure CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Set up GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Backend tests run on push to main/PR
Frontend TypeScript check runs on push
EAS Build trigger for mobile on tagged releases

tasks.title: Configure Analytics and Logging
tasks.description: Set up Sentry for error tracking and structured logging.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Sentry SDK integrated in PWA frontend
Sentry SDK integrated in mobile app
Structured logging with request IDs for tracing

tasks.title: Prepare App Store Submission
tasks.description: Complete all requirements for iOS App Store and Google Play submission.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: App icons in all required sizes
Splash screens for iOS and Android

tasks.title: Frontend E2E Testing with Playwright
tasks.description: Create end-to-end browser tests for PWA frontend.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: E2E tests run in CI pipeline

global_context.tdd_methodology: Write tests alongside implementation, run tests AFTER both are complete
